properties.name: Breakfast @ Polly's Pancake Parlor
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe672 Route 117, Sugar Hill, NHAnother place outside of time. Skip the continental breakfast at your Bed & Breakfast and make the pilgrammage to Polly\'s Pancake Parlor for the panoramic views (see photo on link above), and flashbacks to your own memories of grandma\'s home cooked meals. Most romantic time of year: Fall foliage season Audio postcard from NPR: http://www.nhpr.org/node/9816

properties.name: Candelight Stroll @ Strawbery Bank
properties.description: Posted by RealestatecafeMarcy St. and Hancock St, Portsmouth, NHCalled one of the 10 great places to visit by flickering lights by USA Today, the Candlelight Stroll will appeal to those romantics who long for a simpler, uncommercialized Christmas. See link above for wide range of activities in 2005, and upcoming event for December 2006. Most romantic time of year: Winter

properties.name: Candlelight dinner @ Shaker Village
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe288 Shaker Rd., Canterbury, NH 03224The Shaker-like simplicity of this website does not capture the romance of a candlelight dinner at Canterbury Shaker Village. Haven\'t been to their new restaurant yet, but dinner in the original buildings felt like traveling back to a previous century. In the past, guests were treated to an optional starlight walking tour of the village. Most romantic in the Fall foliage.

properties.name: Marginal Way Walk
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe DREAM DATE: Recommend timing this mile-long walk so that you can enjoy changing colors of the sky and rugged coast line at Twilight. Romantic vistas extend into the night, with shore lit dining at Jackie Too\'s.

properties.description: Posted by SystemRoute 302, Bretton Woods, NHMount Washington Resort at Bretton Woods (603) 278-1000

properties.name: Rock above Rockport
properties.description: Posted by MikettThis headland above Rockport Harbor is a nice place to sit and enjoy some quiet time. There is a small walkway that leads up from Atlantic Ave. Often you see families scrambling over the rocks, and once I even got an impromptu concert as a man practiced playing his flute.

properties.name: Rockport Harbor
properties.description: Posted by MikettRockport is a beautiful little town to spend a summer day at! Lots of little shops and fun things to do. From this little roundabout you can see everything around you.

properties.name: Washington Memorial, Mt. Auburn Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by Mikett A memorial to George Washington up on the top of a hill at Mt. Auburn Cemetery
